template.name: Random for mixed tags from mixer
template.description: Random songs for specified tags from the Mixed Tag scanning module in Custom Scan, requires Custom Scan plugin

parameter.name: Playlist name
parameter.value: Random for mixed tags from mixer

parameter.name: Do not repeat tracks within same playlist
Mixed tag 1 type
parameter.data: lt=Less than=lt,le=Less or equal to=le,ge=Greater or equal to=ge,gt=Greater than=gt,eq=Equal to=eq,contains=Contains=contains
